name: Slash and Rewind
description:
You are in control of a robot named Etunim, the creation that a mad scientist has created to protect him from enemies. Your creator is in big trouble and you have to clear his laboratory of robots to stop them from stealing the scientist's work.

This game combines minor parkour elements and rewind mechanics (which has the theme for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2) that allow you to slice through many enemies in one swift motion.

Available for MacOS and Windows.

If on MacOS, it does not allow you to open it, follow this link and try it out:

https://howtomacos.com/2019/02/24/fix-the-application-cant-be-opened-on-mac/

If you liked the game, don't forget to leave a comment down below!
